reviewText: By far the best of the Hot Body series in my honest opinion.
Great DVD Zdenka is on top form a must for hot body fans

HBI's videos follow a tried & true formula. If you've seen 1 video & are into it, you'll most likely at least LIKE the others, as there are always hot girls involved.

This one has good production values, nice gyrating dance action and hot babes. Brittany Love, Goldie & Zdenka in particular stand out.

Pink Factor - very nice. More of the great spreads and lingering close-ups you need to "get you there". Check out HBI's racier "sneaky specials & sneaky previews" line for even hotter action (but w/ marginally less hot babes & amateurs). Get the VHS for cheap, burn it, & add to your collection when you want sexy, busty girls parading in thongs, then naked.
